text:
CI failing on GH Actions but passing on travis:

```Got exception outside of a @test
  SystemError: realpath: No such file or directory
  Stacktrace:
   [1] #systemerror#39(::Nothing, ::Function, ::Symbol, ::Bool) at ./error.jl:106
   [2] systemerror at ./error.jl:106 [inlined]
   [3] realpath(::String) at ./path.jl:322```
Has anyone seen this before?  <https://github.com/JuliaIO/JLD2.jl/runs/1849243028?check_suite_focus=true>

elements.text: CI failing on GH Actions but passing on travis:

Got exception outside of a @test
  SystemError: realpath: No such file or directory
  Stacktrace:
   [1] #systemerror#39(::Nothing, ::Function, ::Symbol, ::Bool) at ./error.jl:106

   [3] realpath(::String) at ./path.jl:322

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
very possible that GH and travis have different directory structure the repo/test env is placed in

elements.text: very possible that GH and travis have different directory structure the repo/test env is placed in

text:
Hm, good question. This is the code that errors:
```    @save "out.jld2" x y
    JLD2.jldopen("out.jld2", "r") do f
        @test f["x"] == x
        @test f["y"] == y
    end```
(the `jldopen` part errors)
